original: 劉關張三人於張飛莊園後之桃園祭告天地，三人結為兄弟，同心協力，救困扶危；上報國家，下安黎庶，此即「桃園三結義」。
text: Liu Guanzhang and three people in Taoyuan after Zhang Fei Manor made a tribute to the world. The three became brothers, working together to rescue the poor and help the danger; report to the country and go to An Li Shun, this is the "Taoyuan Three Unity."
